short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sets Google Slide to Presentation mode while retaining chrome tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Normally, when starting a slideshow in Google Slide, you lose the ability to view chrome tabs and easily switch between tabs/windows. With the GSlide Presenter chrome extension, just press the extension icon and it will switch to slideshow mode while still retaining chrome tabs. Click the button again, and it will switch you back to slide edit mode.
